Headline: Temporary Southbound #52 Kedzie/California Reroute near Kedzie/31st
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via near Kedzie/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 26th, California, 31st, Kedzie, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/31st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
